TopicTitle: kopernicus & outer planets mods not working

Articles.Content:
i'm not sure if it's just me not doing it right or something else but I was sent to the link from a Youtube video that was uploaded 2 months ago and followed the steps shown and it still shows as incompatible could it possibly be other mods that are installed causing the issues? i'm using KSP version 1.10.1.29 with the following mods installed not including kopernicus;
- AstronomersVisualPack
- AstronomersVisualPack-1.11
- Environmental Visual Enhancements
- Near Future Props
- Scatterer
- Tarsier Space Tech
- Station Parts Expansion Redux
- Kerbal Engineer Redux
- Modular Flight Integrator
- CommunityTerrainTexturePack
(trying to install Outer planets mod) 
Game seems to work with only Kerbal Engineer, tarsier space tech, scatterer, E.V.E, near future props station parts expansion redux, and both astronomers visual packs  below are screenshots of how all files are placed in game data file
{***EDIT*** files being put in the game data folder as shown stops the incompatibility pop up message from showing but kopernicus and outer planets mods still dont work and causes scatterer to stop functioning correctly} 
![2020-10-21 (1)](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/73263497/96808197-3c8c8e80-13cd-11eb-9056-fe8f1ef45ecb.png)
![2020-10-21 (2)](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/73263497/96808200-3f877f00-13cd-11eb-92d1-7c7bd209e470.png)

Okay, there are a couple things here.

First, kopernicus is only available for 1.10.x in a dev state, but it is very stable and should be just fine for playing OPM.

Grab the dev version here:

Despite still being WIP,  the only things keeping it from full stable release are some issues that don't concern a stock + OPM user.

Second, you seem to have downloaded a .zip file of the master branch of the mods. Use the release menu instead to get a version ready for release with only what you need.

Third, you seem to have just emptied the contents of Kopernicus and OPM into your GameData. The folder structure they should come in is:

.zip file

--> GameData

--> -->Kopernicus (or outer planets Mod)

-->-->-->under the hood stuff (what you have in GameData right now)

-->--> dependencies (CTTP, Modular Flight Integrator, etc)

 

So, to fix this, I would:

1.  Delete everything in GameData EXCEPT AstronomersVisualPack, EnvironmentalVisualEnhancements, KerbalEngineer, NearFutureProps, scatterer, Squad, SquadExpansion, StationPartsExpansionRedux, TarsierSpaceTech, and ModuleManager.4.1.4.dll .

2. Reinstall OPM and Kopernicus following the above folder structure. This release for OPM and this release (download the 1101 .zip) for Kopernicus.

3. Load it up, have fun! (If it still doesn't work, come back here. I'd be happy to help!)

 

(Also, welcome to the forums!)
